document.full_text: damage to a gas cylinder caused a loud noise outside a reactor building at japan's quake-hit fukushima daiichi nuclear plant as rubble was being cleared away, plant operator tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on tuesday.
document.title: damage to gas cylinder caused bang at fukushima
lines_and_colors: damage to a gas cylinder caused a loud noise outside a reactor building at japan's quake-hit fukushima daiichi nuclear plant as rubble was being cleared away, plant operator tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on tuesday.
